name: SubtleCrypto.wrapKey
description: The wrapKey() method of the SubtleCrypto interface "wraps" a key. This means that it exports the key in an external, portable format, then encrypts the exported key. Wrapping a key helps protect it in untrusted environments, such as inside an otherwise unprotected data store or in transmission over an unprotected network.

refs.name: Web Cryptography API
refs.description: The definition of 'SubtleCrypto.wrapKey()' in the 'Web Cryptography API' specification.
